summary: A department-store window decorator learns there is a vacancy for her dream job in the run-up to Christmas, only to find a professional rival has his eye on it too.
cast: Chyler Leigh|Paul Campbell|Naomi Judd|Terence Kelly|Matty Finochio|Cameron Mathison|Eric Keenleyside|Christie Laing|Tobias Slezak|Daniella Martucci|Matthew Hoglie
title: El escaparate del amor
